author: Dirk Diggler

text: The part from 1:52-2:16 is definitely my favorite, especially the 'repeat' at 2:04-2:16.  For whatever reason, it always seemed as though that 'repeat' played only every other time the line was heard (i.e. the whole track was 4 minutes long instead of 2), until I verified that I was wrong.  But it still gives that feeling:  "Hey, you've been out in the snow field for a long time now!"  I think the slow, quiet, ponderous style is what creates the effect.

author: NYCrazyRob

text: If this is Secret of Mana II, why is there a "3" in the title above?
author: NYCrazyRob

text: The original title is Seiken Densetsu 3. It was a Japan exclusive Squaresoft Action JRPG, and one of the best in Super Famicom console series. It was never meant to be released to US. Because Secret of Mana is Seiken Densetsu 2 in JP, hence the unofficial name Secret Of Mana II.
